Issue.creator: jfilippone
Issue.summary: Moving dependencies up to fabric-node-sdk breaks build
Issue.description: When winston ^2.2.0 was moved from the fabric-ca-client package.json to the fabric-node-sdk package.json a level up, it leaves fabric-ca-client without a definition of winston's version.Â So if you use a more advanced version of winston (major version 3), in the application that you are importing fabric-ca-client into, it will try to use that one and fail because winston 3 is very different.
